snippet: An MV-22 Osprey made what was described as a hard landing during a training exercise in Hawaii.
abstract: One Marine is killed and 21 other people are hurt when Marine Corps aircraft makes hard landing during training exercise in Hawaii.
lead_paragraph: An MV-22 Osprey made what was described as a hard landing during a training exercise in Hawaii.

headline.main: Marine Is Killed and 21 Are Hurt in Aircraft Mishap
headline.print_headline: Marine Is Killed and 21 Are Hurt in Aircraft Mishap
